announcements.title: SectionCup-"Photography Cup" registration deadline!
announcements.description: The registration deadline for SectionCup-"Photography Cup" is January 18th. Make sure to sign up before then!

announcements.title: Inaugural Ceremony of RBU Literature Festival 2026
announcements.description: A spectacular celebration of literature, ideas, and creative expression, organized in association with the Vidarbha Literature Foundation (VLF) on 16th January 2026, at 10:30 AM, Main Auditorium.

announcements.title: Nazariya x Sony
announcements.description: We’re excited to announce an exclusive Photography Workshop in collaboration with Sony, if storytelling through visuals excites you, this is something you don’t want to miss.

announcements.title: NATIONAL YOUTH DAY
announcements.description: Student Representative Council (SRC) , is organizing a special programme under the National Initiative – Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2026.
